thread.title: Russell Westbrook accidentally nailed a ref in the head with the ball and got a tech for it
thread.title_full: Russell Westbrook accidentally nailed a ref in the head with the ball and got a tech for it

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Russell Westbrook accidentally nailed a ref in the head with the ball and got a tech for it
text:
Oh no!
Sometimes the best laid plans fall through. Russell Westbrook may be an emotional player but he did not mean for this to happen. He nailed the referee in the head with this pass and by default had to be called for a technical foul.
Westbrook tried to beg and plead and say he didn’t mean to do it but this ref was not having it. The ref never smiled or said it was okay. He just stared at him like this the entire time.
After this play and a couple of non-calls leading up to it, Russ rightfully needed a minute. 
Westbrook just went into the tunnel. He used to do that when he was overly steamed about something. Was very upset about last few minutes.
— Royce Young (@royceyoung) January 5, 2017
